text:
* Coney Island: Two views of Dreamland Park, Coney Island's leading amusement center.

* N.B. NOT Coney Island.

Columbian Exposition, Chicago, 1893.
title: Islands - Coney Island - Brooklyn - Dreamland Park.

text:
* Coney Island: Two views of Dreamland Park, Coney Island's leading amusement center.

* N.B. NOT Coney Island.

Columbian Exposition, Chicago, 1893.
title: Islands - Coney Island - Brooklyn - Dreamland Park.

text:
(1) Coney Island, Dreamland Park:
Surf Ave., south side, between West 10th and 5th Streets, showing "The Tower" and lake which were demolished prior to 1917.

About 1908.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2) The same, looking north west from the beach. This property was converted into a public park prior to 1917, and all buildings in Dreamland were demolished.

About 1908.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
title: Islands - Coney Island - Dreamland Park - [Dreamland Park tower.]

text:
Coney Island (Brooklyn): Shown is the "tower of lights" in Dreamland Park, Coney Island's leading amusement center prior to 1911. This beautiful park was completely destroyed by a spectacular fire on May 27, 1911.

About 1910

Beecher Ogden
title: Islands - Coney Island - [Dreamland Park.]

text:
Coney Island: A view of the famous Dreamland entertainment center.

Copyright 1910 by George P. Hall & Son
New York

1910
title: Islands - Coney Island - [Dreamland entertainment center.]
